root: ^Welcome Joe to the new sector. I hope your journey was somewhat pleaseant and not too fast for you.
^I can only imagine how hard it was travelling through the asteroid fields.
^Let's discuss your next mission, no time for chit chat.

c-0: ^For your next mission Joe you will be exploring Planet Myka.
^The planet is all made up of jungle and there are lots of poisonous snakes throughout so be careful Joe.
^I hope you can get there quickly as we need to rescue these babies.
